fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Is there self-censorship among journalists when reporting on issues that the government considers politically sensitive?

fxInfo_responses.value: There is self-censorship on a few highly sensitive political issues but not on moderately sensitive issues.
There is little or no self-censorship among journalists.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2meslfcen, *_osp, *_ord
